modName: Forestry Logs From Trees and Working tableSaw –
modShortDescription: I though its nonsense to get wood directly from trees. And as theres already woodLogs in game, why not drop them instead?
modDescription:
I though its nonsense to get wood directly from trees. And as theres already woodLogs in game, why not drop them instead?

As I looked through code, I also findout theres hidden workstation: tableSaw, so I fixed it to work.

Recipe for tableSaw is original, I just restored it and added schematic etc.

## What This Mod Does

* tableSaw workstation works, incl progression and schematic in loot
* [Trees](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-trees/) drop woodLogs instead of woodResource
* woodLogs, driftWood and Firewood pickupable  
   * Tweaked direct drops from blocks above (cutting)  
   * Blocks above can be saw in tableSaw
* Removed Log recipe (just cut some tree)
* Bushes drop Branches instad of wood  
   * Branches dropped also from trees
* LogSpike recipe + upgradeable  
   * Client with icons, server with colored cone
* WoodCube recipe
* WindowPlate recipe
* You can pickup all [spikes](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-traps/) and barbed fence
* Added CharCoal  
   * Dropped by burned trees
* Added Tree Sap  
   * Often dropped by any tree (semi-random)  
   * Some recipes as substitute for Animal Fat
* Added Burning Log Spikes and recipes
* Mines can be picked up
* Removed recipe for burning log spike, instad its upgrade from Steel one, other types are downgrade from steel burning log spike
* Branches as substitutes in primitive tools/weapons recipes and arrows. -NEW

## Info

* Its server-only friendly as it doesn’t have any assets
* Client version works only for clients, not on server
* Created for A20
* Works in existing worlds, just existing tableSaws wont work (example in POI), need to place new one

## Installation

Just extract into Mods folder (create one if theres none)

## Changelog

* **v1.2.3:** Added recipes for primitive tools/weapons with new item (Bundled branches) as substitute for handle, added recipes for arrows from branches.
* **v1.2.2:** Removed direct recipe for burning log spike, instead you need to upgrade from steel using Tree Sap.
* **v1.2.1:** Quickfix of log spike.
* **v1.2.0:** Some cleanup; added burning LogSpikes; added Tree Sap and recipes; added Charcoal and recipes; fixed sorting in tableSaw; branches from trees.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Cronosus/7dtd/tree/main/SawWood)** Client-side version (with icon)  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Cronosus/7dtd/tree/main/SawWoodS)** Server-side version (without icon)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/27853-cronosuss-mods-~a17-a20/).
